name: My girlfriend is a werewolf and wants to go to the dogpark at night.
name_original: My girlfriend is a werewolf and wants to go to the dogpark at night.
description:
Your werewolf girlfriend wants to go to the park!

But OH NO! Tonight is full moon!!

Luckily you have your umbrella with you to shield her from the moonlight!

A game made by me and Schmorb. 

GameDesign: Whythree

Engine: Whythree

Art: Schmorb. 

You can find Schmorb here: 

https://www.artstation.com/schm0rb

https://www.instagram.com/schm0rb/

Theme of the GameJam was: "Die Nacht bricht an" - "The Night approaches", or how we chose to view it: "Oh dang, it do be getting dark - better hurry to the park"

There were also optional challenges: 

1. Build in an easteregg ( Check)

2. Playtime needs to be exact 60s. (Check)

3. Game is playable with exactly 2 buttons (Check? Is the cursor a button? We decided no) 

4. The Game ends where it started. (Nope, we don't have that.) 

Assets used: 

Free Catgirl Fighting Voice Pack by Cici Fyre 

Sline&Noise: https://timothyadan.itch.io/magic-attacks-bundle

Forest: https://opengameart.org/content/forest-ambience

Sfx_Throw: https://opengameart.org/content/sfxthrow (Pitch adjusted by me)
